content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of a steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position(z1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using insert_item with incorrect entity type
- Ensure that the second argument in the insert_item function is an Entity or EntityGroup, not a Position. Verify that you are passing the correct entity reference.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
